2063.subject: BUS
2063.descrlong: Focuses on differences and similarities between management concepts and practices across the cultures and geographic boundaries; the role and impact of multinational corporations (MNCs) on global economy; cultural influences and impacts on global management practices; comparative leadership studies; global competitive strategies; intercultural communication; political risk analyses; negotiations; human resources development across the cultures; labor relations; and ethics and social responsibility. (Offered only as interest warrants.)
